title: On-Premises Bridge download center
content:
The On-Premises Bridge download center is located on the right side of the Endpoints tab. It contains links to download remote products and services, which can be used in connection with the On-Premises Bridge.

The following links are available.

IDOL

You can download IDOL connectors and other required files for the IDOL knowledge indexing solution, which enables you to index knowledge articles to Service Management. For more information, see Index external knowledge using IDOL connectors.

UCMDB

UCMDB/Universal Discovery

By default, it's a link that forwards you to the software and license download site, where you can download UCMDB/UD. 

If your suite administrator has replaced the software and license download site link with direct download links to the UD Probe and UCMDB Local Client embedded in the containerized UD/UCMDB (see Enable direct download of UD Probe and Local Client from the Service Management UI), you can download the following UCMDB installation files:

  • Universal Discovery Probe (Windows and Linux)
  • UCMDB Local Client (Windows, MacOS, and Linux)

SMAX Push Adapter

You can also download the UCMDB Push Adapter 10.20 or later. 

Operations Orchestration

The Operations Orchestration (OO) section contains a link to the software and license download site, from which you can search for and then download OO installation files.

Alternatively, if your suite is using the OO Containerized, which has the OO RAS and OO Workflow Designer installation and upgrade files embedded in it, you have the option to replace the product website link with direct download links to the embedded installation and upgrade files. Clicking each direct download link will trigger an automatic download of the corresponding installation or upgrade file. To enable this link, see Enable direct download of OO RAS and OO Workflow Designer from the UI.

You can download OO Remote Action Service (RAS) and OO Workflow Designer from the enabled links. 

Operations Manager i

You can download Operations Manager i (OMi). This enables you to integrate OMi with Service Management. For more information, see Integrate with Operations Manager i.

Project and Portfolio Management

You can download Project and Portfolio Management Center (PPM), which enables you to synchronize Service Management with PPM. For more information, see Integration with Project and Portfolio Management (PPM).
